location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: William Edward Frere, Mauritius to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter thanking Pelly for his letter of 17 January [1873?] giving information on his whereabouts and of his brother [Sir Bartle Frere]'s health as well as asking Pelly if he will be visiting the Comoros Island and then coming on to Mauritius and reporting on his improved health since arriving there.
